message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we try $125? It's a great value for this unique product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $115, which is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal for this amazing product.
I'm getting close, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to consider a price of $105?
I'm really close to giving in, Bob! I can do $112.50, which is the best I can do. It's still a great deal for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $102?
I'm really close to walking away, Bob. I can do $107.50, which is the absolute lowest I can go. It's still a great deal for this amazing product.
I'm really close to giving up, but I'll make one last offer. Would you be willing to consider a price of $95?
